original_text: And Herod with his soldiers treated him with contempt and mocked him. Then, arraying him in splendid clothing, he sent him back to Pilate.
korean_text: 헤롯이 그 군인들과 함께 예수를 업신여기며 희롱하고 빛난 옷을 입혀 빌라도에게 도로 보내니

sentences.original_text: And Herod with his soldiers treated him with contempt
Then, arraying him in splendid clothing,
he sent him back to Pilate.
